name: Buddy (itch) (Deylz)
description:
Survive as long as you can by dodging and defeating the enemy spaceships.

Your little satellite-buddy can deactivate shields but be careful,without buddy your back is defenseless!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Space - Shooting
Left Shift - Shoot / Retrieve Buddy

Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021 "Stronger Together"
All code and art done from scratch by me, with the only exception being the background image from falcosun.com https://opengameart.org/content/loopable-hd-nebulas)
